modName: Shinzue CME Save (ECE Vertex Face Edit)
summary: Here's the CME save some people were asking me for, character face that i created using ECE and editing in vertex mode.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]IMPORTANT : READ THE MOD REQUIREMENTS BELOW AS WELL AS THE INSTALLATION NOTES (THIS IS A CME SAVE FILE NOT A GAME SAVE)[/b][/size]

Here's the CME save some people were asking me for, character face that i created using ECE and editing in vertex mode.
In this video you can see how my game looks as well as the character face. The thumbnail has a different haircut/haircolor, the face is the same. You can see the character at 1:22 and 2:08.

In general using Opethfeldt ENB 7.3 beta, for the 2 pics i took with her dark hair i used DHenb (problem is that one looks really bad in actual gameplay, but it's nice for taking character pics)

[youtube]2OuQT7BZEBM[/youtube]

Shinzue CME Character Save
[b]
IMPORTANT : READ THE MOD REQUIREMENTS BELOW[/b]

Before copying the save, you'll need to install these mods to get the same result :

Brows - High Resolution
Enhanced Character Edit
Improved Eyes Skyrim-9249-6-2
Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC - Body and face texture UNP
No more Blocky Faces
No more Ugly bronze shine
Pretty Face
Racemenu - DisableFaceGenCache v1-1
SG Female Eyebrows
SG Hair pack 268 by HelloSanta
SkyUI
UNP Blessed Body UNPB Redux Project

Other recommended mods:

Visuals :

ENB Opethfeldt 7.3 beta
Dat grass
Static mesh improvement mod

Animations :

[Skeleton]XP32 Maximum Skeleton
Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS - FNIS Behavior 5_1_1 (Don't forget to use the tools to generate the FNIS data after installing all the animation mods)
HDT Physics Extensions
Feminine running and new dash animation
Pretty sit idle all in one pack
Bowlegged jump animation fix
New Animation two handed sword
New Animation for 1h weapon
New Animation for magic casting
New Animation for running with bow

Other:

MFG Console - MFGconsole
Beautiful Female NPCs - Beautiful_Female_NPCs_1_4
[b][size=4]
Installation instructions - >
[/size][/b]
copy _1_commonTriRaces.slot to example:

c:\users\(Your user name)\documents\my games\skyrim\cme_save

After loading your game:

1) press ` to open up the game command console
2) type in showracemenu and hit enter
3) select nord female
4) go to body / slot load - > hit next and click on slot1
